languages.text: "Может, Ирлиэт и спасла Лорд-капитана, пожертвовав своим камнем душ. Но опасность возникла именно из-за нее. Опять".
"Yrliet may have saved the Lord Captain by sacrificing her spirit stone, but she was the one who caused the danger in the first place. Again."
languages.original_text: "Может, Ирлиэт и спасла Лорд-капитана, пожертвовав своим камнем душ. Но опасность возникла именно из-за нее. Опять".

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet may have saved the Lord Captain by sacrificing her spirit stone, but she was the one who caused the danger in the first place. Again."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet may have saved the Lord Captain by sacrificing her spirit stone, but she was the one who caused the danger in the first place. Again."

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet may have saved the Lord Captain by sacrificing her spirit stone, but she was the one who caused the danger in the first place. Again."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “或许伊莉耶特确实是牺牲了自己的灵魂石才救回了舰长大人，可这件事的罪魁祸首本来就是她。这已经不是第一次了。”
languages.original_text: "Yrliet may have saved the Lord Captain by sacrificing her spirit stone, but she was the one who caused the danger in the first place. Again."

traits.locale_text: “或许伊莉耶特确实是牺牲了自己的灵魂石才救回了舰长大人，可这件事的罪魁祸首本来就是她。这已经不是第一次了。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Yrliet a peut-être sauvé la vie {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} en sacrifiant sa pierre-esprit, mais c'est bien à cause d'elle qu'{mf|il|elle} était en danger à la base. Une fois de plus. »
languages.original_text: "Yrliet may have saved the Lord Captain by sacrificing her spirit stone, but she was the one who caused the danger in the first place. Again."

traits.locale_text: « Yrliet a peut-être sauvé la vie {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} en sacrifiant sa pierre-esprit, mais c'est bien à cause d'elle qu'{mf|il|elle} était en danger à la base. Une fois de plus. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Yrliet habrá salvado a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán al sacrificar su joya espiritual, pero fue ella quien creó el peligro en primera instancia. Una vez más».
languages.original_text: "Yrliet may have saved the Lord Captain by sacrificing her spirit stone, but she was the one who caused the danger in the first place. Again."

traits.locale_text: «Yrliet habrá salvado a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán al sacrificar su joya espiritual, pero fue ella quien creó el peligro en primera instancia. Una vez más».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「ユリエットは魂縛石を犠牲にしてロード・キャプテンを救ったかもしれないが、そもそも危険を引き起こしたのは彼女だ。二度も」
languages.original_text: "Yrliet may have saved the Lord Captain by sacrificing her spirit stone, but she was the one who caused the danger in the first place. Again."

traits.locale_text: 「ユリエットは魂縛石を犠牲にしてロード・キャプテンを救ったかもしれないが、そもそも危険を引き起こしたのは彼女だ。二度も」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Yrliet mag den Lord Captain gerettet haben, indem sie ihren Seelenstein geopfert hat, doch sie hatte die Gefahr ja überhaupt erst ausgelöst. Erneut."
languages.original_text: "Yrliet may have saved the Lord Captain by sacrificing her spirit stone, but she was the one who caused the danger in the first place. Again."

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet mag den Lord Captain gerettet haben, indem sie ihren Seelenstein geopfert hat, doch sie hatte die Gefahr ja überhaupt erst ausgelöst. Erneut."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "Yrliet may have saved the Lord Captain by sacrificing her spirit stone, but she was the one who caused the danger in the first place. Again."

languages.text: "Tamam, ruh taşını feda edip Lord Kaptan'ı kurtaran Yrliet... Fakat onu baştan bu tehlikeye sokan kim? Yine o."
languages.original_text: "Yrliet may have saved the Lord Captain by sacrificing her spirit stone, but she was the one who caused the danger in the first place. Again."

traits.locale_text: "Tamam, ruh taşını feda edip Lord Kaptan'ı kurtaran Yrliet... Fakat onu baştan bu tehlikeye sokan kim? Yine o."
